   19: 
   20: -module(hello_SUITE).
   21: -export([all/0, suite/0, hello/1]).
   22: 
   23: suite() ->
   24:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   25:      {timetrap, {minutes, 5}}].
   26: 
   27: all() ->
   28:     [hello].
   29: 
   30: hello(Config) ->
   31:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
   32:     HelloSrc = filename:join(DataDir, "hello.erl"),
   33:     HelloRoot = filename:rootname(HelloSrc),
   34:     Options = [binary,report_errors,{d,'RUN_AS_TESTCASE'}],
   35:     {ok,hello,Code} = compile:file(HelloSrc, Options),
   36:     {module,Mod} = code:load_binary(hello, HelloRoot, Code),
   37: 
   38:     ok = hello_test(),
   39: 
   40:     true = code:delete(Mod),
   41:     false = code:purge(Mod),
   42: 
   43:     ok.
   44: 
   45: hello_test() ->
   46:     Ps0 = processes(),
   47:     SystemLogger = erlang:system_info(system_logger),
   48: 
   49:     L = [<<"-root">>,<<"/home/user/git/otp">>,<<"-progname">>,<<"/home/user/git/otp/bin/cerl -debug +asmdump">>,<<"--">>,<<"-home">>,<<"/home/user">>,<<"--">>,<<"-kernel">>,<<"shell_history">>,<<"enabled">>,<<"--">>,<<"--">>],
   50: 
   51:     try
   52:         hello:hello(L)
   53:     after
   54:         _ = erlang:system_flag(system_logger, SystemLogger),
   55:         Ps1 = processes(),
   56:         Ps = Ps1 -- Ps0,
   57: 
   58:         %% Kill any new test processes. There should at least be the
   59:         %% system logger process installed by hello.
   60:         [begin
   61:              io:format("~p\n", [process_info(Pid)]),
   62:              unlink(Pid),
   63:              exit(Pid, kill)
   64:          end || Pid <- Ps]
   65:     end,
   66: 
   67:     ok.
